messages.subject: Gassan Books
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Nihonto Gang, I have 4 copies of: JAPANESE MASTER SWORDSMITHS: THE GASSAN TRADITION Morihiro OGAWA (1989) They are new, but have been on a shelf for a
messages.messageBody:
Dear Nihonto Gang,

I have 4 copies of:

JAPANESE MASTER SWORDSMITHS:
THE GASSAN TRADITION
Morihiro OGAWA (1989)

They are new, but have been on a shelf for a while. Slight shelf
damage as a result. Nothing major, and certainly nothing affecting
the content, text, images, pages, etc. Minor scuffing on cover at
worst. This is the Boston Museum of Fine Arts catalog on their Gassan
Exhibition in the '80's, where Gassan-san himself attended and forged
a sword for the event. Very nice plates and info.

I figured I'd give you guys a shot before I put them on eBay or
something. I'm asking $100 a copy, and I'll ship for free within the
U.S., actual shipping charges otherwise. Paypal or deposit to my
Wachovia account (if that bank still exists by the time you read this
message) will be fine.

Let me know...

Best,

Andres
